item.title: TalentCLEF 2025 Workshop Schedule
item.description: Tentative Schedule that might change in the near future. Thursday 11 September 14:15-15:45 Session 1 Welcome Overview of the TalentCLEF 2025: Skill and Job Title Intelligence for Human Capital Management Luis Gasco, Hermenegildo Fabregat, Laura García-Sardiña, Paula Estrella, Daniel Deniz, Álvaro Rodrigo, Rabih Zbib AlexU-NLP at TalentCLEF 2025: Curriculum-Driven Hybrid Retrieval for Multilingual Job Title Matching Rana Barakat, Omar Mokhtar, Marwan Torki, Nagwa Elmakky UDII-UPM at TalentCLEF 2025: Task A - Multilingual Job Title Matching
